title: "When you open the canister, snakes pop out."
description: The latest on North Korea, the weekend's tax marches, and how the health care town halls are working. Then Jon, Jon, and Tommy answer questions in the first Friend of the Pod Q & A.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
